Articles.Content:
so.. does anybody tried using principia in 1.7.2 and Time Control to see if it works with latest version of it (of time control)?
All I really want is the physics delta time slider that it has, that can be changed in flight. I love that feature but maybe another mod can give me that,...¿?

Edited July 25, 2019 by Agustin
@Agustin, I split this comment off from the other thread it was in, as it is kind of Off topic for that thread.

For now I am using physics delta time viewer mod for in-flight slider on delta physics time. Time Control has that and I wanted it for that reason. I got away with the other mod. I just like to control that in flight for when I have large ships vs small ships.

Though I installed Time Control too yesterday and it seemed to be working well with principia. I unninstalled it later though. I just had what I wanted with Physics delta time viewer mod.
